item.title: The daily sandwich: Serious Eats on sandwiches
item.description: Serious Eats has a blog, A Sandwich A Day, with a nicely illustrated and well researched sandwich every single day. In this great country of ours, one could eat a different sandwich every day of the yearâ€”so that's what we'll do. Here's A Sandwich a Day, our daily look at sandwiches around the country. Got a sandwich we should check out? As a a part of this they note the Grandwich competition in Grand Rapids, where 10 sandwich vendors competed for the best sandwich in town prize.
